name: Basic Modern Sonic Engine
description:
It's a basic non scrolling Sonic engine. Based off of the Adventure and Boost games.

Made in Scratch 3.0/Turbowarp.

Left and Right to move left and right

X to jump and X again to double jump

X then A to air dash 

Z to Spindash

B to Boost

Down while moving to slide.

Credit to all the art used in the game or the site.
